Package game.monsters

package game.monsters
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    game
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DebuffMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a second attack which applies a debuff to the enemies damage.
    FlyingMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a fly move, that allows them to not take damage in the next turn.
    Monster
    Monster is the base class for any monster types, it is responsible for the monsters current status, including health, damage, level, xp, whether the monster is fainted or awake, and temporary status effects.
    PoisonMonster
    A special type of Monster with a poison attack.
    RiskyMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a second attack which instant kills either the enemy or itself randomly.
